original_text: At the command of the Lord the people of Israel set out, and at the command of the Lord they camped. As long as the cloud rested over the tabernacle, they remained in camp.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 여호와의 명령을 따라 행진하였고 여호와의 명령을 따라 진을 쳤으며 구름이 성막 위에 머무는 동안에는 그들이 진영에 머물렀고

sentences.original_text: At the command of the Lord the people of Israel set out
sentences.korean_translation: 여호와의 명령으로 이스라엘 백성은 길을 떠났고

sentences.original_text: and at the command of the Lord they camped.
As long as the cloud rested over the tabernacle
